thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hengli Petrochemical Plans Textile Project, Units Plan Loans, Acquisition

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hengli Petrochemical Plans Textile Project, Units Plan Loans, Acquisition
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Hengli Petrochemical Co Ltd:
* SAYS UNIT PLANS TO INVEST 12.3 BILLION YUAN ($1.95 billion) IN NEW TEXTILE MATERIAL PROJECT
* SAYS DALIAN REFINERY UNIT PLANS TO APPLY FOR 6.0 BILLION YUAN SHORT-TERM LOAN, 39.3 BILLION YUAN SYNDICATED LOAN
* SAYS CHEMICAL FIBRE UNIT PLANS TO BUY TEXTILE FIRM FOR 127.8 MILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2nPoKxE ; bit.ly/2sfXvku ; bit.ly/2sfIWh2 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2967 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
